title: Who's Haunting The White House
description:
Tonight, my special guest is author and researcher Jeff Belanger who's here to discuss his book Who's Haunting The White House: The President's Mansion and the Ghosts That Live There.

Want more paranormal episodes? Follow our new podcast 'Paranormal Fears' on any podcast app or Apple Podcasts.

Enjoy the AD-FREE versions of our latest episodes and our archives right now from anywhere in the world.

Seven - Our podcast for the jaded ones that need wicked stories in their lives!



Follow us on Instagram @mysteriousradio
Follow us on TikTok mysteriousradioTikTok
Follow us on Twitter @mysteriousradio
Follow us on Pinterest pinterest.com/mysteriousradio
Like us on Facebook Facebook.com/mysteriousradio
